ingredients.content: 350 g potatoes, peeled and cut into cubes (approx. 3 cm)
500 g boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into pieces (4-5 cm)

preparations.content: Place onion and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, curry powder, sugar, vinegar, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg and blend <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add potatoes and bay leaf and cook <b>10 min/Varoma//speed <b>.
Add chicken and sultanas and cook <b>15 min/90°C//speed 1<b>.

Cut each loaf of bread into thirds, and reserve the ends (set aside the centre third to use in future recipes - see Tips). Hollow out the soft inner part of loaf portions, leaving approx. 2 cm of bread as a 'container'. Fill each hollowed out loaf portion with curry and serve.
